lines.text: All right, take it easy son, I just wanted to ask you a question. What would you rather have? a shoe full of dollar bills, or two socks of fives?
And what might your name be, lass?
Perhaps you've heard it, 'tis Lorna Doone
Say, what part of Scotland are you from?
He's from southern Scotland, below the McMason McDixon Line.
I thought you might be a wee bit lonesome, so I brought some cookies. You like cookies?
Oh that I do, especially blonde ones.
I oughta take something for my nerves.
